name: basic-application
description: A basic application using Bable transpiler and ES6

scripts.build: babel --presets es2015 js --out-dir build/babel && browserify build/babel/main.js -o build/main.bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets es2015 ]
scripts.watch: babel --presets es2015 js -w --out-dir build/babel && browserify build/babel/main.js -o build/main.bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets es2015 ]

author: Justin Voelkel
